title: 9-year-old hit by stray bullet in Conroe
content:
A stray bullet hit a 9-year-old Conroe girl Sunday night, sending her to the hospital with non-life threatening injuries, police said.
The girl went to the window of her house in the 1100 block of South Seventh after hearing some males arguing around 8:55 p.m. One of several shots fired by a 16-year-old boy, who was arguing with two other males, struck her.
The suspect fled, but police were able to locate him. He has been arrested for aggravated assault with a deadly weapon for the incident.
